headline.main: OLD WORLD AIR AT NEW WORLD BENEFIT

lead_paragraph: Hollywood could hardly have reproduced more faithfully the atmosphere of London's Mayfair that has been provided by the British War Relief Society for its Piccadilly Arcade sale of donated American family treasures that opened yesterday in a little redcobbled street that can be entered at 6 East Fifty-seventh Street, in the heart of the upper Fifth Avenue shopping district.
